note:
Retired from U S Probation where I toiled for the U S courts for 20 years.
Volunteer at my church St Ann Episcopal in Nashville Tn
Widower as of April 2022
One son Thomas who teaches in Shanghai China
Progressive in politics and economics
Believer in science and the ability of humankind to overcome injustices with truth and free expression
Believer in the equality of all humans and the right of self determination
